value.title: StarCraft 2: Brood Lords & Ultralisks vs Late Game Protoss! (Rogue vs Classic)
value.excerpt: Classic (Protoss) versus Rogue (Zerg) in a great game of Zerg versus Protoss in StarCraft 2. Great match, great reactions from Special, really fun series. This best of 5 series was played as a precursor to Nation Wars 2022.  Follow Special on Twitch! https://www.twitch.tv/special_

value.title: StarCraft 2: GAME OF THE YEAR! (So Far)
value.excerpt: Goblin versus Krystianer in an epic game of professional StarCraft 2. It's a bit early to call it the best game of SC2 of this year already, but it surely is the best so far. In this Protoss versus Protoss neither player ever manages to secure a solid economy so an intense micro battle is the only option.
